long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SEO SERP Scraper is a powerful browser extension designed to help SEO professionals and marketers easily extract and analyze key data from Google search results. With just a click, users can scrape titles, URLs, and meta descriptions from the SERPs (Search Engine Result Pages), providing valuable insights into competitor strategies and keyword optimization.

Key features include:

Quick Scraping: Extract essential SEO data like titles, links, and meta descriptions directly from search results.

Data Export: Export the extracted data in CSV format for further analysis.
User-Friendly Interface: Clean and modern design with intuitive buttons for scraping and exporting.

Customization: Display your logo and provide a direct link to your website for easy brand recognition.

Perfect for anyone involved in SEO who needs to gather insights quickly and efficiently, the SEO SERP Scraper is a must-have tool for better optimization and competitive analysis.
